__e: I, um... just wanted to be on the winning team for once.
Your daddy's still a winner in your eyes, right?
You know... There's never gonna be a golden ticket back into my life.
She had always seen her son as a winner and could not see him as anything else.
And somehow thinking you're a winner and I'm a loser makes you feel better.
You are a survivor And the strongest person I've ever known.
